name: Space War Year 10.001
description:
In this game you control a spaceship and the goal is to kill every enemy spaceship possible,when you kill all the enemies of the wave, another wave will appear with one more enemy then the last time.Try to destroy the many as you can to get a good highscore.every enemy has a chance to drop a power up, that will incrise one of 3 atributes,speed,power,and health.

i made this game to end the free unity course.from the 3d models to gameplay,programing, testing and others thing was done by me,but i didn't make the music, i don't own any of the music in the game, and the music i used is listed down below.

Space Mode - Teen Titans Go!: Stellar Showdown [OST]

Nebular Focus - Dan Heing

Laser Gun Sound Effect(i don't remember for sure if this is the one i used)

Controls

Acceleration(Go foward) -
--- keyboard --- 
shift
or
mouse 2
--- controller --- 
button A, on xbox controller
or
X,on playstation controler
or
B, on switch controler

Shoot -
--- keyboard ---
mouse 1
or
space
--- controller --- 
button X or Y, on xbox controller
or
square and triangle, on playstation controller
or
Y or X, on nintendo switch controller

Rotate the Spaceship -
--- keyboard ---
wasd
or
arrows key
--- controller --- 
analogic stick
or
d-pad
